item.title: Logitech’s Pro X2 Superstrike offers haptic-based clicks and rapid trigger
item.description: Logitech’s next flagship wireless gaming mouse is ditching mechanical switches for an analog system equipped with haptics actuators to simulate the feeling of a click. The mouse is called the Pro X2 S

item.title: The Astro A20 X headset was made for multi-console homes
item.description: Logitech has announced the Astro A20 X wireless gaming headset, which has a feature that console players might appreciate having: it lets you swap between audio from two platforms, be it an Xbox, Swit
